message: This is a test group to see how well Convore works with the VoiceOver screen reader, both on the Mac and on iOS.  Feel free to share your experiences.
Hello, I'm one of the founders and creators.  We haven't tried this before on screen readers, I'm curious if it will work properly.
I'm testing this on the iphone app.
So far it's working well; trying this with my Mac Mini running Snow Leopard.  After I update my iPad, I'll try it again. Very slick, easy to navigate. Not nearly as cluttered as I had expected.
I'm trying this on my mac, and I haven't had any problems so far. I haven't tried this on the iPhone yet. I'll get around to that tomorrow.
For now testing under windows with Jaws 10 from web. As i understand it's something like a real-time forum? Great for impatient people haha JK i like the concept. Will try later on IOS
